attributes.action: Encourage the Speaker to resign immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker's statement to the house today (18th May) showed a completed lack of understanding of the anger of the public and his role in managing the expenses system.  He must be encouraged to resign immediately.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
